trans-unit.source: Provides access to instances of the C# code generator and code compiler.
This class provides methods that can be used to retrieve instances of the C# <xref:System.CodeDom.Compiler.ICodeGenerator> and <xref:System.CodeDom.Compiler.ICodeCompiler> implementations.
This class contains a link demand and an inheritance demand at the class level that applies to all members.
A <xref:System.Security.SecurityException> is thrown when either the immediate caller or the derived class does not have full-trust permission.
Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="Microsoft.CSharp.CSharpCodeProvider"></xref> class.
Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="Microsoft.CSharp.CSharpCodeProvider"></xref> class by using the specified provider options.
The value for `providerOptions` is obtained from the element in the configuration file.

You can identify the version of the <xref:Microsoft.CSharp.CSharpCodeProvider> you want to use by specifying the `<providerOption>` element, supplying "CompilerVersion" as the option name, and supplying the version number (for example, "v3.5") as the option value.
You must precede the version number with a lower case "v".
A <xref href="System.Collections.Generic.IDictionary`2"></xref> object that contains the provider options from the configuration file.
providerOptions is `null`.
Gets an instance of the C# code compiler.
An instance of the C# <xref href="System.CodeDom.Compiler.ICodeCompiler"></xref> implementation.
Gets an instance of the C# code generator.
An instance of the C# <xref href="System.CodeDom.Compiler.ICodeGenerator"></xref> implementation.
Gets the file name extension to use when creating source code files.
This file name extension is usually the extension used by the language's source code files.
The file name extension to use for generated source code files.
Generates code for the specified class member using the specified text writer and code generator options.
Members are generated differently depending on their context.
For example, a method in an interface or a field in an enumeration is generated differently than a method or field on a class.
This implementation generates code for a member in the class context.
A <xref href="System.CodeDom.CodeTypeMember"></xref> to generate code for.
The <xref href="System.IO.TextWriter"></xref> to write to.
The <xref href="System.CodeDom.Compiler.CodeGeneratorOptions"></xref> to use when generating the code.
Gets a <xref href="System.ComponentModel.TypeConverter"></xref> for the specified type of object.
A derived class can override this method to provide specific types of type converters for specific data types.
The type of object to retrieve a type converter for.
A <xref href="System.ComponentModel.TypeConverter"></xref> for the specified type.
